Description: Blue glazed (traces of) steatite scarab, elytra marked, elytra marked with double suture, pierced longitudinally, base decorated with spirals surrounding nomen.
Curator's comments: Martin, Egyptian Administrative and Private-Name Seals, no. 120
Bibliographic references: Martin 1971 / Egyptian administrative and private-name seals, principally of the Middle Kingdom and Second Intermediate Period (120)
